keywords.name: $name
keywords.description: This mentions the user who sent the message. NOTE: If you use it in the channel send part of an event where the user leaves you will receive an invalid user mention.
keywords.condition: Compatible with all except member leave and member ban

keywords.name: $channel
keywords.description: Adds the channel name to the message.

keywords.name: $server
keywords.description: This gives you the name of the server in which message is sent.
keywords.condition: Not compatible with Private Message Received

keywords.name: $message
keywords.description: This adds the message content of the message sent.
keywords.condition: Compatible with Message Received and Private Message Received

keywords.name: $rollnum(min, max)
keywords.description: This generates a random number where you replace min with the smallest number and max with the largest one. For example, if you made a dice command that uses $rollnum(1,6) it would show replace where you put the $rollnum(1,6) with the result. If your command was to reply with '$rollnum(1,6) is the roll of your dice.'

keywords.name: $date
keywords.description: This gives your current date.

keywords.name: $avatar
keywords.description: The current avatar of the user who called the command.
keywords.condition: Compatible with all except member leave and member ban

keywords.name: $defaultAvatar
keywords.description: The default avatar of the user.
keywords.condition: Compatible with all except member leave and member ban

keywords.name: $memberCount
keywords.description: Gives the number of members currently in the server.

keywords.name: $serverCreateTime
keywords.description: Gives the time the server was created.

keywords.name: $messageAfterCommand
keywords.description: gives all raw message content after command.
keywords.condition: Compatible with Message Received and Private Message Received

keywords.name: $commandCount
keywords.description: gives the number of commands bot has.

keywords.name: $namePlain
keywords.description: name of user who called command without mention.

keywords.name: $serverIcon
keywords.description: Gives the icon of the server

keywords.name: $serverBanner
keywords.description: Gives the banner of ther server if there is available one.

keywords.name: $serverDescription
keywords.description: Gives the description of the server, if it exists.

keywords.name: $serverSplash
keywords.description: Gives the splash of the server, if it exists.

keywords.name: $botAvatar
keywords.description: Gives the avatar of the bot.

keywords.name: $botName
keywords.description: Name of the bot

keywords.name: $mentionedAvatar
keywords.description: Gives you the avatar of the mentioned member.

keywords.name: $mentionedName
keywords.description: name of mentioned user in a mention

keywords.name: $mentionedNamePlain
keywords.description: name of a mentioned user in plain format

keywords.name: $random{}
keywords.description: Used to select a random message or link for embed images. Used like $random{abc|def|ghi} where | is the seperator between choices to be picked.

keywords.name: $discriminator
keywords.description: discriminator of command caller.

keywords.name: $tag
keywords.description: tag of command caller

keywords.name: $timeCreated
keywords.description: Account creation time of command caller.

keywords.name: $ID
keywords.description: ID of command caller.

keywords.name: $serversSharedWithBot
keywords.description: Number of servers shared with command caller.

keywords.name: $channelID
keywords.description: ID of channel where message is sent.
keywords.condition: Only message recieved or react add

keywords.name: $channelCreateDate
keywords.description: Only message recieved or react add
keywords.condition: Date of the creation of the channel.

keywords.name: $channelAsMention
keywords.description: Mention of channel
keywords.condition: Only message recieved or react add

keywords.name: $botDiscriminator
keywords.description: Discriminator of the bot

keywords.name: $botTag
keywords.description: Tag of bot

keywords.name: $botDefaultAvatar
keywords.description: Default avatar of bot

keywords.name: $botTimeCreated
keywords.description: Creation time of bot

keywords.name: $botID
keywords.description: ID of bot

keywords.name: $ping
keywords.description: Ping to gateway

keywords.name: $inviteURL
keywords.description: URL to invite the bot

keywords.name: $serverCount
keywords.description: Amount of servers bot is In.

keywords.name: $allMemberCount
keywords.description: Amount of users in all servers the bot is in.

keywords.name: $mentionedDiscriminator
keywords.description: Discriminator of mentioned user.

keywords.name: $mentionedTag
keywords.description: Tag of mentioned user.

keywords.name: $mentionedIsBot
keywords.description: Checks the mentioned user is bot or not.

keywords.name: $mentionedDefaultAvatar
keywords.description: Default avatar of mentioned user.

keywords.name: $mentionedTimeCreated
keywords.description: Account creation date of mentioned user

keywords.name: $mentionedID
keywords.description: ID of mentioned user.

keywords.name: $mentionedServersSharedWithBot
keywords.description: How many servers the mentioned user shares with the bot.

keywords.name: $eval
keywords.description: Used to mark the start of a block of javascript code.

keywords.name: $halt
keywords.description: Must be used after done writing javascript section of command to mark the end of the code.

keywords.name: $get(var)
keywords.description: Used to get variables created by either in javascript block or $set()

keywords.name: $set(var,value)
keywords.description: Used to set values. Types include numbers, strings, and boolean(true or false).
